title: Maduro wins reelection amid outcry over vote
text:
Maduro wins reelection amid outcry over vote 1:41am EDT - 02:03
Venezuela’s President Nicolas Maduro comfortably won re-election in a controversial vote on Sunday, the election board said, though his main rivals both declared the poll illegitimate due to alleged widespread irregularities.
Venezuela’s President Nicolas Maduro comfortably won re-election in a controversial vote on Sunday, the election board said, though his main rivals both declared the poll illegitimate due to alleged widespread irregularities. //www.reuters.com/video/2018/05/21/maduro-wins-reelection-amid-outcry-over?videoId=428920091&videoChannel=13421
